div.p: Reasons that a value associated with a test or other finding is missing. Includes all codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/data-absent-reason version 3.3.0 and additional codes covering other missing value circumstances.

publisher.value: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative

description.value: Reasons that a value associated with a test or other finding is missing. Includes all codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/data-absent-reason version 3.3.0 and additional codes covering other missing value circumstances.

display.value: Unknown: The value is not known.

definition.value: Unknown: The value is not known.

display.value: Asked But Unknown: The source human does not know the value.

definition.value: Asked But Unknown: The source human does not know the value.

display.value: Temporarily Unknown: There is reason to expect (from the workflow) that the value may become known.

definition.value: Temporarily Unknown: There is reason to expect (from the workflow) that the value may become known.

display.value: Not Asked: The workflow didn't lead to this value being known.

definition.value: Not Asked: The workflow didn't lead to this value being known.

display.value: Asked But Declined: The source was asked but declined to answer.

definition.value: Asked But Declined: The source was asked but declined to answer.

display.value: Masked: The information is not available due to security, privacy or related reasons.

definition.value: Masked: The information is not available due to security, privacy or related reasons.

display.value: Not Applicable: There is no proper value for this element (e.g. last menstrual period for a male)

definition.value: Not Applicable: There is no proper value for this element (e.g. last menstrual period for a male)

display.value: Unsupported: The source system wasn't capable of supporting this element.

definition.value: Unsupported: The source system wasn't capable of supporting this element.

display.value: As Text: The content of the data is represented in the resource narrative.

definition.value: As Text: The content of the data is represented in the resource narrative.

display.value: Error: Some system or workflow process error means that the information is not available.

definition.value: Error: Some system or workflow process error means that the information is not available.

display.value: Not a Number (NaN): The numeric value is undefined or unrepresentable due to a floating point processing error.

definition.value: Not a Number (NaN): The numeric value is undefined or unrepresentable due to a floating point processing error.

display.value: Negative Infinity (NINF): The numeric value is excessively low and unrepresentable due to a floating point processing error.

definition.value: Negative Infinity (NINF): The numeric value is excessively low and unrepresentable due to a floating point processing error.

display.value: Positive Infinity (PINF): The numeric value is excessively high and unrepresentable due to a floating point processing error.

definition.value: Positive Infinity (PINF): The numeric value is excessively high and unrepresentable due to a floating point processing error.

display.value: Not Performed: The value is not available because the observation procedure (test, etc.) was not performed.

definition.value: Not Performed: The value is not available because the observation procedure (test, etc.) was not performed.

display.value: Not Permitted: The value is not permitted in this context (e.g. due to profiles, or the base data types)

definition.value: Not Permitted: The value is not permitted in this context (e.g. due to profiles, or the base data types)

display.value: The value cannot be determined, for some unspecified reason.

definition.value: The value cannot be determined, for some unspecified reason.

display.value: The reason the information is not present is not known.

definition.value: The reason the information is not present is not known.

display.value: The answer is missing because nothing of a type of thing is known to exists, e.g., the siblings of an only child. Also use this code to represent a 'none of the above' answer

definition.value: The answer is missing because nothing of a type of thing is known to exists, e.g., the siblings of an only child. Also use this code to represent a 'none of the above' answer

display.value: Missing due to a problem collecting, identifying, or locating the specimen, including patient refusal or unable to provide specimen

definition.value: Missing due to a problem collecting, identifying, or locating the specimen, including patient refusal or unable to provide specimen

display.value: Missing due to a problem with the specimen, e.g. inadequate specimen, contamination, clotting, improper tube type, improper storage, too small, etc.

definition.value: Missing due to a problem with the specimen, e.g. inadequate specimen, contamination, clotting, improper tube type, improper storage, too small, etc.

display.value: Missing due to instrument malfunction.

definition.value: Missing due to instrument malfunction.
